1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import os
4 import rospy
5 import rospkg
6 import tf
7 from gazebo_msgs.srv import SpawnModel, SpawnModelRequest, SetModelState, SetLinkState
8 from gazebo_msgs.msg import ModelState, LinkState, Quaternion, Point, Pose
9 from sensor_msgs.msg import Imu
10 
11 
12 class IMUBoxStateManager():
13  def __init__(self, model_names, init_poses=None, sdf=True):
14  """
15  Spawns the IMU model.
16 
17  Arguments
18  ---------
19  `model_names`: `List[str]`
20  The model names for the IMU
21 
22  `init_poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
23  `[Pose(Position xyz, Orientation quaternion)]`
24 
25  `sdf`: `bool`
26  launch from sdf or urdf
27  """
28  self.model_names = model_names
29  self.n = len(model_names)
30  self.sdf = sdf
31  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
32  self.imu_q = Quaternion()
33  self.position = Point(1, 1, 1)
34  init_poses = [Pose(position=self.position, orientation=self.imu_q)]
35  # rospy.Subscriber('imu0_pose', Quaternion, self.imu_callback)
36  rospy.Subscriber('imu/data', Imu, self.imu_callback)
37 
38  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/set_model_state')
39  if sdf:
40  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model')
41  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model', SpawnModel)
42  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imubox/model.sdf')
43  self.set_model_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/set_model_state', SetModelState)
44  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
45  xml_string = f.read().replace('\n', '')
46  else:
47  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model')
48  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model', SpawnModel)
49  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imu.urdf')
50  self.set_link_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/set_link_state', SetLinkState)
51  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
52  xml_string = f.read()
53 
54  if init_poses is None:
55  q = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(0, 0, 0)
56  orientation = Quaternion(q[0], q[1], q[2], q[3])
57  position = Point(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
58  init_pose = Pose(position=position, orientation=orientation)
59  init_poses = [init_pose for i in range(self.n)]
60 
61  self.init_poses = init_poses
62  self.req = SpawnModelRequest()
63  self.req.model_xml = xml_string
64 
65  def imu_callback(self, data):
66  # self.imu_q = data
67  self.imu_q = data.orientation
68 
69  def spawn(self):
70  """
71  Spawns the IMU model with the poses defined earlier in
72  `__init__`
73  """
74  for model_name, pose in zip(self.model_names, self.init_poses):
75  try:
76  self.req.model_name = model_name
77  self.req.initial_pose = pose
78  res = self.spawn_model(self.req)
79  print(res)
80  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
81  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
82 
83  def set_poses(self, names, poses):
84  """
85  Sets the poses of the IMU.
86 
87  Arguments
88  ---------
89  `names`: `List[str]`
90  The names of the IMUs
91 
92  `poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
93  The poses of the IMUs
94  """
95  for name, pose in zip(names, poses):
96  self.set_pose(name, pose)
97 
98  def set_pose(self, name, pose=None):
99  """
100  Sets a pose of an IMU
101 
102  Arguments
103  ---------
104  `name`: `str`
105  The name of the IMU
106 
107  `poses`: `geometry_msgs.msg.Pose`
108  The pose of the IMU
109  """
110  pose = Pose(position=self.position, orientation=self.imu_q)
111 
112  if self.sdf:
113  try:
114  state_msg = ModelState()
115  state_msg.model_name = name
116  state_msg.pose = pose
117  state_msg.reference_frame = "world"
118  res = self.set_model_state(state_msg)
119  print(res)
120  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
121  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
122  else:
123  try:
124  link_msg = LinkState()
125  link_msg.link_name = name
126  link_msg.pose = pose
127  link_msg.reference_frame = "world"
128  res = self.set_link_state(state_msg)
129  print(res)
130  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
131  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
132 
133 
134 if __name__ == '__main__':
135  rospy.init_node("set_estimated_imu_positions_data")
136 
137  model_names = ['imu6']
138  state_manager = IMUBoxStateManager(model_names)
139  state_manager.spawn()
140 
141  r = rospy.Rate(30)
142 
143  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
144  state_manager.set_pose(model_names[0])
145  r.sleep()
